description.en:
BitScreener App is one the best real-time crypto-tracking apps, which has served more than 1.2 million traders and investors worldwide. It is now integrating the crowd-sourced data and content functions on blockchain via token BITX. BITX works as a payment method for users to buy advanced data services and as a reward method to pay contributors in BitScreener ecosystem.

 BITX works as the payment method for users to buy advanced data services and the incentive method for the value contributors of the BitScreener ecosystem.
